songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Kirko Bangz]
Don’t suck my dick now, haha, yeah, haha
I don’t do too much, bitch you talk too much, yeah

[Chorus: Kirko Bangz]
I don’t do too much, I don’t say too much
All these bitches wanna do is fight and fuck
She say I sip too much, bitch you trip too much
All these bitches wanna do is fight and fuck
I got this nigga bitch, she on my line
She say I never give her ass no time
And I just do that to stay on her mind
And when I come around she tryna fuck

[Verse 1: Webbie]
It's just some times that we finna give up
She only call when she wanna get fucked
And I pick like a lil dub
She wanna fight so I beat her ass up
Smash that ass like a styrofoam cup
Savage life, you know how I came up
Don't love these hoes, I don’t trust these sluts
You a pussy ass nigga, beat 'em, make me bust a nut (I'm coming)
And cut, know what, y’all probably think I be tripping
When I slide through with these other niggas' women
It's not that, nope I'm just pimping
And it’s just in me, I don’t say too much
I'm a grown man, I don’t like to play too much
A B bitch say I'm in the A too much (ATL)
All day we fuss, all night we fuck
And fuck, and fuck, and fuck

[Chorus: Kirko Bangz]
I don’t do too much, I don’t say too much
All these bitches wanna do is fight and fuck
She say I sip too much, bitch you trip too much
All these bitches wanna do is fight and fuck
I got this nigga bitch, she on my line
She say I never give her ass no time
And I just do that to stay on her mind
And when I come around she tryna fuck

[Verse 2: Lil Lonnie]
She think she too much, I'm just tryna catch a nut
Got another nigga bitch with me and all we do is fuck
See that's why I do not trust, relations, girl I can’t adjust
I know I'm a dog and these bitches know that I'm what's up
She say she feel lonely, she show too much attitude
I show no emotion, nothing like these other dudes
When I'm flying got her overwhelmed with gratitude
But she get the tripping 'bout these hoes, don’t know what to do

[Chorus: Kirko Bangz]
I don’t do too much, I don’t say too much
All these bitches wanna do is fight and fuck
She say I sip too much, bitch you trip too much
All these bitches wanna do is fight and fuck
I got this nigga bitch, she on my line
She say I never give her ass no time
And I just do that to stay on her mind
And when I come around she tryna fuck
songs.title: Due Too Much
